thread.title: Ground News - Sterling Police, CBI issue missing persons alert for two children
thread.title_full: Ground News - Sterling Police, CBI issue missing persons alert for two children

author: Ground News
title: Ground News - Sterling Police, CBI issue missing persons alert for two children
text:
Summary by Ground News Four-yeear-old Zuryah Thalacker and his brother, 23-month-old Ansom, have been missing since Dec. 27 around 1:30 PM. They are believed to be with 28-year-old Justina Lambert. They were last seen near the intersection of Platte Street and Kings Court in Sterling, CO. Share menu More
Filters 1 Articles 1 Articles All Left Center Right
Sterling Journal-Advocate Center High Factuality Sterling Police, CBI issue missing persons alert for two children Sterling Police and the Colorado Bureau of Investigation have activated a missing persons alert for two children from Sterling. Four-yeear-old Zuryah Thalacker and his brother, 23-month-old Ansom Thalacker have been missing since Dec. 27 around 1:30 PM. They were last seen near the intersection of Platte Street and Kings Court in Sterling, CO. Zuryah is described as a white male 3’00 tall 50 pounds with blonde hair and hazel eyes. Ansom is descr…
